response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit you and align with your needs. Considering its value and the impact it can have on your endeavors, I propose a special introductory offer of $7,500 for this exceptional item. This price reflects not only the product's quality but also my commitment to ensuring that you receive a valuable asset at an attractive cost. I look forward to your consideration and the opportunity to discuss how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 7500}
